content:
If you have experience as a Research Officer at the Agency for Defense Development in Korea, developing software for unmanned aerial vehicles, it could be a valuable addition to your resume and could highlight your expertise in developing software for complex systems with high reliability and security requirements.

In your job application article, you could mention this experience and how it has helped you develop skills in software development for complex systems, which can be applied to the work you would be doing as an FDSE at Palantir. You could describe how you worked in a team with project managers and other Ph.D.s to develop software that met strict requirements for reliability and security, and how you contributed to the successful completion of the project.

You could also highlight how your experience at ADD has taught you the importance of working in a team and communicating effectively with different stakeholders to achieve project goals, which are important skills for an FDSE at Palantir.

Overall, your experience at ADD could demonstrate your ability to work on complex projects with high stakes and strict requirements, and could make you a strong candidate for the FDSE role at Palantir.
